Completeness_of_Solution.description: The extent to which the solution addresses all parts of the question.

Correctness_of_Solution.description: The accuracy of the solution provided.

Reasoning_Traceability.description: The ability to follow the logical process that led to the solution.

Time_Efficiency.description: The promptness of the solution provided.

Resource_Efficiency.description: The system's efficiency at using computational and information resources.

Robustness.description: The system's ability to handle various question types and unforeseen issues.

Relevance_of_Information.description: The pertinence of sourced information to the question at hand.

Originality.description: The degree to which the answer is free from data contamination.

accepted_values.fully_original: Completely inferred or analyzed from base principles
